com.google.wave.api.oauth.impl
Class OAuthUser

java.lang.Object
  com.google.wave.api.oauth.impl.OAuthUser

public class OAuthUser
extends java.lang.Object

Objects of this class are stored in Datastore to persist an association between user's wave id + wave id, the user's access token, and the service consumer secret. Holds the request token for later retrieval to exchange it for the access token. 'Detachable' attribute allows object to be altered even after its Persistence Manager is closed.

Author:
kimwhite@google.com (Kimberly White)
